website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight, high-quality option for those who prefer charcoal to propane.
pros: Porcelain-coated steel grates are dishwasher safe and easy to clean
Folds to the size of a tote bag
Comes with a 1 yr. warranty, Grill gate height can be adjusted
cons: The charcoal can be messy and difficult to clean up and transport

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe and does not work as described.
customer_reviews.text: In theory this would be a great product if it worked as described, but it doesn't. When used according to directions, coals would not stay lit even with more lighter fuel than should be necessary. It is also unsafe, my husband singed the hair on his arm while using it according to the directions. I'm very unhappy with the item and would return it in a heartbeat except the window of return expired before we had the opportunity to try the product. I will write to the company to express my feelings as this is not typical for a Coleman product.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Melted .... Do Not Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I loved the space-saving aspect, and because I prefer charcoal over gas grills. I thoroughly enjoyed this grill for about 6 months before the grate melted. Do not purchase this item unless you're looking for a disposable grill. Zero Stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Junk buy. Grates melted first use. Product arrived broken in the box but yet box was undamaged. There are much much better options out there for the price. I wish I could say this product is better than nothing, but it really isn't.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley H

customer_reviews.title: Would never buy again
customer_reviews.text: Poor Design, missing parts, poor selection of materials. This product is hard to believe is a Coleman!
customer_reviews.author: Kawkawlin-man

customer_reviews.title: bad purchase
customer_reviews.text: the center piece melted, the teflon chips off, it did not come with all its parts, not easy to use. this is just bad product.
customer_reviews.author: JANET

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product, with a good chance to improve, specially on the lock.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Mora Vargas

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a small, compact, easy to pack grill for camping. Worked great cooking meals for 2 adults and 2 children. Would recommend based on portability and convenience alone. Only downfall was this did not come with a carry case like alot of coleman products.
customer_reviews.author: MAM

customer_reviews.title: Coleman Fold N Go Charcoal Grill
customer_reviews.text: This product is worth every penny the Coleman Fold N Go Charcoal Grill is great it is easy to use and clean stores away in small areas I would recomend anyone with a 18 wheeler or a camper with limited space to put things buy this it is perfect for the person on the go!
customer_reviews.author: love to read

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time
customer_reviews.text: This grill is worthless. One of the worst purchases that I have ever made. The grill takes an extremely long time to heat up the coals and once they are heated, there isn't enough heat to cook a hot dog.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Maybe I am stupid--maybe the design it bad
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying for 2 hours to light this grill. At first I followed directions and it did not seem a match would do anything. I tried putting a bit of paper--no luck. I have almost used up all the fuel in my lighter--I gave up on matches. I tried opening it up and lighting by building a pile. I just wanted to eat not frustrate myself. Wish I knew what the trick was, others seem to like this stupid thing.
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality!
customer_reviews.text: Used this grill two times on a camping trip. The grill holders melted on the second use and we were left with no bbq for 3 days. Coleman, you need to fix this!!
customer_reviews.author: Malandrino

product_meta.title: Coleman Fold N Go Charcoal Grill
product_meta.description: Taste that charcoal flavor on the go when you're cooking up burgers, hotdogs and brats on a rugged Coleman Fold N Go Charcoal Grill. All 150 sq. in. of cooking space heats up quickly with a unique, innovative chimney design that uses standard size briquettes. Cooks can independently control the heat on each side by adjusting each grate height. When you're done, the dishwasher-safe, porcelain-coated steel grates wipe down quickly for simple cleanup, and then the grill folds up compactly—smaller than a tote bag. Making clean up even easier are the ash pans which slide out for quick disposal of the charcoal ash. It's perfect for camping, hunting, tailgating and in the backyard. It also includes a one year limited warranty.
feature_bullets: 150 sq. in. (967.74 sq. cm) cooking surface
Vitreous coated hinged shells attached with hinges
Fast preheat using the unique chimney design
Easy clean up, dishwasher safe grates
